pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api
Interface ServletServerEngine

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigurationAware, ServerEngine
All Known Implementing Classes:
JettyServletWebsocketEngine, TomcatServletWebsocketEngine
public interface ServletServerEngine
extends ServerEngine

This is an extension for ServerEngine interface. Provides functionality for accepting incoming HTTP requests as WebSockets connection. Servlet server engines are required in web applications. Servlet engines works in combination with BristlebackHttpHandler and Spring Framework DispatcherServlet,

Created on: 2012-04-25 17:05:35

Author:
Wojciech Niemiec
See Also:
BristlebackHttpHandler, Spring DispatcherServlet JavaDoc
